review: It's like I had never dropped my phone! Jacob was super chill and fixed my screen in a matter of minutes. He was also on time and chose to meet me instead of having me come to him. Super convenient for a busy student.
name: Cindy Z.

review: They came to my work and fixed my phone the same day. Super nice, fast, highly recommend!
name: Erika A.

review: Great service at a great price. I got hooked up same day, price was competitive for a home visit and everything is now tip top.
name: Aron S.
